title: Building Editor: Make 3D view of building levels more understandable

content.raw:
When there are multiple levels, it's not evident in the 3D View which level you're currently editing. 

Some options:
- Make current level transparent, and other levels opaque
- Make higher levels invisible
- Make high levels a stripped down outline
- Make higher levels invisible, but put a line indicator along the entire length of the building to show where each level is
